clumio_iam_role_tags.description: Additional tags for Clumio IAM Roles.

is_dynamodb_enabled.description: Flag to indicate if Clumio Protect and Discover for dynamodb are enabled

is_ebs_enabled.description: Flag to indicate if Clumio Protect and Discover for ebs are enabled

is_ec2_mssql_enabled.description: Flag to indicate if Clumio Protect and Discover for ec2_mssql are enabled

is_rds_enabled.description: Flag to indicate if Clumio Protect and Discover for rds are enabled

is_s3_enabled.description: Flag to indicate if Clumio Protect and Discover for S3 are enabled

path.description: Value of path set on the AWS IAM roles, policies and instance_profile resources of the module. If not specified the default value is /clumio/.

role_external_id.description: A key that must be used by Clumio to assume the service role in your account. This should be a secure string, like a password, but it does not need to be remembered (random characters are best).

wait_time_before_create.description: Time in seconds to wait before creation of resources. This will be required to be set to a value above 45s in the case of shifting from old terraform template to the module based template.
